name: cauchy_p1
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p1 (x y: ℝ) (hx : x ≥ 0) (hy : y ≥ 0) (hxy : x + y ≤ 1) : 4 * x^2 + 4 * y^2 + (1 - x - y)^2 ≥ 2 / 3 := by

name: cauchy_p2
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p2 (x y: ℝ) (hx : x ≥ 0) (hy : y ≥ 0) (hx1 : x ≤ 1) (hy1 : y ≤ 1) : x * √(1 - y^2) + y * √(1 - x^2) ≤ 1 := by

name: cauchy_p3
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p3 (x y z: ℝ) (h : x > 0 ∧ y > 0 ∧ z > 0) (g : x + y + z = 3) : 4 / x + 1 / y + 9 / z ≥ 12 := by

name: cauchy_p4
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p4 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : a / (b + c) + b / (c + a) + c / (a + b) ≥ 3 / 2 := by

name: cauchy_p5
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p5 (a b c d : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) (hd : d > 0) (h : a + b + c + d = 1) : 1 / (b + c + d) + 1 / (c + d + a) + 1 / (a + b + d) + 1 / (a + b + c) ≥ 16 / 3 := by

name: cauchy_p6
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p6 (x y z: ℝ) (h : x > 0 ∧ y > 0 ∧ z > 0) (g : x * (x + y) + y * (y + z) + z * (z + x) = 1) : x / (x + y) + y / (y + z) + z / (z + x) ≥ (x + y + z) ^ 2 := by

name: cauchy_p7
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p7 (x y z: ℝ) (h : x > 0 ∧ y > 0 ∧ z > 0) ( g : z * (x + y) + x * (y + z) + y * (z + x) = 1) : z / (x + y) + x / (y + z) + y / (z + x) ≥ (x + y + z) ^ 2 := by

name: cauchy_p8
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p8 (x y: ℝ) (hx : x > 0) (hy : y > 0) (g : √(2 * x + 1) + √(2 * y + 3) = 4) : x + y ≥ 2 := by

name: cauchy_p9_mod
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p9_mod (x y : ℝ) (h₂ : x > 0 ∧ y > 0) : ( x + y ) * ( 1 / x + 1 / y ) ≥ 4 := by

name: cauchy_p12
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p12 (x y a b: ℝ) (hy : y ≠ 0) (hb : b ≠ 0) (hxy : x^2 + 1 / y^2 = 1) (hab : a^2 + 1 / b^2 = 4) : |a / y + x / b| ≤ 2 := by

name: cauchy_p13
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p13 (n : ℕ) (a b : Fin n → ℝ) (ha : ∀ i, a i > 0) (hb : ∀ i, b i > 0) : ∑ i, a i / b i ≥ (∑ i, a i)^2 / ∑ i, a i * b i := by

name: cauchy_p14
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p14 (n : ℕ) (a b : Fin n → ℝ) (ha : ∀ i, a i > 0) (hb : ∀ i, b i > 0) : ∑ i, a i / (b i)^2 ≥ (∑ i, a i / b i)^2 / ∑ i, a i := by

name: cauchy_p15
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p15 (a b c d e : ℝ) (h : (a - b)^2 + (b - c)^2 + (c - d)^2 + (d - e)^2 = 1) : a - 2 * b - c + 2 * e ≤ √10 := by

name: cauchy_p16
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p16 (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 2) (a : Fin n → ℝ) (ha1 : ∀ i, a i < 1) (ha2 : ∀ i, a i ≥ 0) (hs : ∑ i : Fin n, a i = n - 2) : ∑ i : Fin n, ((a i)^2 / (1 - a i)) ≥ ((n : ℝ) - 2)^2 / 2 := by

name: cauchy_p18
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p18  theorem CS2 (x y : ℝ) (h₂ : x > 0 ∧ y > 0 ∧ z > 0 ) : ( x + y + z ) * ( 1 / x + 1 / y + 1 / z ) ≥ 9 := by

name: cauchy_p19
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p19 (n : ℕ) (a b : Fin n → ℝ) (hn : n > 0) (ha : ∀ i, a i > 0) (hb : ∀ i, b i > 0) (sum_eq : ∑ i, a i = ∑ i , b i): ∑ i, (a i) ^ 2 / (a i + b i) ≥ (∑ i, a i) / 2 := by

name: cauchy_p25
formal_statement: theorem cauchy_p25 (n : ℕ) (x : Fin n → ℝ) (s : ℝ) (hn : n > 2) (hs : s = ∑ i, x i) (hx : ∀ i, x i < s - x i) : ∑ i, (x i)^2 / (s - 2 * x i) ≥ s / (n - 2) := by
